actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to require that, for purposes of determining medicaid eligibility, there be disregarded so much of an individual's social security income as in attributable to any cost-of-living increase in social security benefits which takes effect in 1975.

summary.text: Requires that, for purposes of determining medicaid eligibility under title XIX of the Social Security Act, there be disregarded so much of an individual's social security income as is attributable to any cost-of-living increase in social security benefits which takes effect in 1975.

titles.title: A bill to require that, for purposes of determining medicaid eligibility, there be disregarded so much of an individual's social security income as in attributable to any cost-of-living increase in social security benefits which takes effect in 1975.
